name: chip-away
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text.x_y: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
